defined_text = {
    name = get_b_p1_1
	text = {
		localisation_key = debug_card_1
		trigger = {
            event_target:blackjack_player_1_tag = {
                OR = {
                    AND = {
                        check_variable = {
                            which = blackjack_player_1_hand_1
                            value = 1
                        }
                        NOT = {
                            check_variable = {
                                which = blackjack_player_1_hand_1
                                value = 2
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    AND = {
                        check_variable = {
                            which = blackjack_player_1_hand_1
                            value = 14
                        }
                        NOT = {
                            check_variable = {
                                which = blackjack_player_1_hand_1
                                value = 15
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    AND = {
                        check_variable = {
                            which = blackjack_player_1_hand_1
                            value = 27
                        }
                        NOT = {
                            check_variable = {
                                which = blackjack_player_1_hand_1
                                value = 28
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    AND = {
                        check_variable = {
                            which = blackjack_player_1_hand_1
                            value = 40
                        }
                        NOT = {
                            check_variable = {
                                which = blackjack_player_1_hand_1
                                value = 41
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = debug_card_2
		trigger = {

                            check_variable = {
                                which = blackjack_player_1_hand_3

                            value = 38

                            }

                                which = blackjack_player_1_hand_3

                        NOT = {
                            check_variable = {
                                which = blackjack_player_1_hand_13
                                value = 27
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    AND = {
                        check_variable = {
                            which = blackjack_player_1_hand_13
                            value = 39
                        }
                        NOT = {
                            check_variable = {
                                which = blackjack_player_1_hand_13
                                value = 40
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    AND = {

                            which = blackjack_player_1_hand_13
                            value = 52
                        }
                        NOT = {
                            check_variable = {
                                which = blackjack_player_1_hand_13
                                value = 53

		trigger = {
            event_target:blackjack_player_1_tag = {

    name = get_b_p2_6

		localisation_key = debug_card_1
		trigger = {
            event_target:blackjack_player_1_tag = {

                    AND = {

    name = get_b_p2_7
	text = {
		localisation_key = debug_card_1
		trigger = {
            event_target:blackjack_player_1_tag = {
                OR = {
                    AND = {
                        check_variable = {
                            which = blackjack_player_2_hand_7

    name = get_b_p2_17
	text = {
		localisation_key = debug_card_1
		trigger = {
            event_target:blackjack_player_1_tag = {
                OR = {
                    AND = {
                        check_variable = {
                            which = blackjack_player_2_hand_17
                            value = 1
                        }
                        NOT = {
                            check_variable = {
                                which = blackjack_player_2_hand_17
                                value = 2
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    AND = {
                        check_variable = {
                            which = blackjack_player_2_hand_17
                            value = 14
                        }
                        NOT = {
                            check_variable = {
                                which = blackjack_player_2_hand_17
                                value = 15
                            }
                        }

                            }

                        }
                    }
                    AND = {
                        check_variable = {
                            which = blackjack_player_2_hand_18
                            value = 52
                        }
                        NOT = {
                            check_variable = {
                                which = blackjack_player_2_hand_18
                                value = 53
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
		}
	}
}

		trigger = {
            event_target:blackjack_player_1_tag = {

    name = get_b_p3_16
	text = {
		localisation_key = debug_card_1
		trigger = {
            event_target:blackjack_player_1_tag = {
                OR = {
                    AND = {
                        check_variable = {
                            which = blackjack_player_3_hand_16
                            value = 1
                        }
                        NOT = {

                                which = blackjack_player_3_hand_16

                            }

    name = get_b_p4_4
	text = {
		localisation_key = debug_card_1
		trigger = {
            event_target:blackjack_player_1_tag = {
                OR = {
                    AND = {
                        check_variable = {
                            which = blackjack_player_4_hand_4
                            value = 1
                        }
                        NOT = {
                            check_variable = {
                                which = blackjack_player_4_hand_4
                                value = 2
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    AND = {

                        }
                        NOT = {
                            check_variable = {
                                which = blackjack_player_4_hand_4
                                value = 15
                            }
                        }

                        }

		localisation_key = debug_card_1
		trigger = {
            event_target:blackjack_player_1_tag = {
                OR = {
                    AND = {
                        check_variable = {
                            which = blackjack_player_4_hand_6
                            value = 1
                        }
                        NOT = {
                            check_variable = {
                                which = blackjack_player_4_hand_6
                                value = 2
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    AND = {
                        check_variable = {
                            which = blackjack_player_4_hand_6
                            value = 14
                        }
                        NOT = {
                            check_variable = {
                                which = blackjack_player_4_hand_6
                                value = 15
                            }
                        }

defined_text = {
    name = get_b_p4_7
	text = {
		localisation_key = debug_card_1
		trigger = {
            event_target:blackjack_player_1_tag = {
                OR = {
                    AND = {
                        check_variable = {
                            which = blackjack_player_4_hand_7
                            value = 1
                        }
                        NOT = {

                            }
                        }

		localisation_key = debug_card_2
		trigger = {
            event_target:blackjack_player_1_tag = {
                OR = {
                    AND = {
                        check_variable = {
                            which = blackjack_player_4_hand_16
                            value = 2
                        }
                        NOT = {
                            check_variable = {
                                which = blackjack_player_4_hand_16
                                value = 3
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    AND = {
                        check_variable = {
                            which = blackjack_player_4_hand_16
                            value = 15
                        }
                        NOT = {
                            check_variable = {
                                which = blackjack_player_4_hand_16
                                value = 16
                            }

defined_text = {
    name = get_b_p4_17
	text = {
		localisation_key = debug_card_1
		trigger = {
            event_target:blackjack_player_1_tag = {
                OR = {
                    AND = {
                        check_variable = {
                            which = blackjack_player_4_hand_17
                            value = 1
                        }
                        NOT = {
                            check_variable = {
                                which = blackjack_player_4_hand_17
                                value = 2
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    AND = {
                        check_variable = {
                            which = blackjack_player_4_hand_17
                            value = 14
                        }
                        NOT = {
                            check_variable = {
                                which = blackjack_player_4_hand_17
                                value = 15
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    AND = {
                        check_variable = {
                            which = blackjack_player_4_hand_17
                            value = 27
                        }
                        NOT = {
                            check_variable = {
                                which = blackjack_player_4_hand_17
                                value = 28
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    AND = {
                        check_variable = {
                            which = blackjack_player_4_hand_17
                            value = 40
                        }
                        NOT = {
                            check_variable = {
                                which = blackjack_player_4_hand_17
                                value = 41
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
		}

                        }
                    }
                    AND = {
                        check_variable = {
                            which = blackjack_player_4_hand_18
                            value = 39
                        }
                        NOT = {
                            check_variable = {
                                which = blackjack_player_4_hand_18
                                value = 40
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    AND = {
                        check_variable = {
                            which = blackjack_player_4_hand_18
                            value = 52
                        }
                        NOT = {
                            check_variable = {
                                which = blackjack_player_4_hand_18
                                value = 53
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
		}
	}
}

        trigger = {
            event_target:blackjack_player_1_tag = {
                OR = {
                    AND = {
                        check_variable = {
                            which = blackjack_dealer_hand_5
                            value = 6
                        }
                        NOT = {
                            check_variable = {
                                which = blackjack_dealer_hand_5
                                value = 7
                            }
                        }

    name = get_b_d_6
	text = {
        localisation_key = debug_card_1
        trigger = {
            event_target:blackjack_player_1_tag = {
                OR = {
                    AND = {
                        check_variable = {
                            which = blackjack_dealer_hand_6
                            value = 1
                        }
                        NOT = {
                            check_variable = {
                                which = blackjack_dealer_hand_6
                                value = 2
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    AND = {

                        }
                        NOT = {

                                which = blackjack_dealer_hand_6
                                value = 15
                            }
                        }

                            }
                        }

        trigger = {
            event_target:blackjack_player_1_tag = {
                OR = {
                    AND = {
                        check_variable = {
                            which = blackjack_dealer_hand_12
                            value = 11
                        }
                        NOT = {
                            check_variable = {
                                which = blackjack_dealer_hand_12
                                value = 12
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    AND = {
                        check_variable = {
                            which = blackjack_dealer_hand_12
                            value = 24
                        }
                        NOT = {
                            check_variable = {
                                which = blackjack_dealer_hand_12
                                value = 25
                            }
                        }

                            which = blackjack_dealer_hand_12
                            value = 37
                        }
                        NOT = {
                            check_variable = {
                                which = blackjack_dealer_hand_12
                                value = 38
                            }
                        }

                            which = blackjack_dealer_hand_12

                                which = blackjack_dealer_hand_12

                        }
                        NOT = {
                            check_variable = {
                                which = blackjack_dealer_hand_18
                                value = 49
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

        trigger = {

defined_text = {
    name = get_p1s
	text = {
		localisation_key = debug_b_playing
        trigger = {
            event_target:blackjack_player_1_tag = {
                NOT = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = blackjack_player_1_status
                        value = 1
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
    
    text = {
        localisation_key = debug_b_stood
        trigger = {
            event_target:blackjack_player_1_tag = {
                AND = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = blackjack_player_1_status
                        value = 1
                    }
                    NOT = {
                        check_variable = {
                            which = blackjack_player_1_status
                            value = 2
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

    text = {
        localisation_key = debug_b_busted
        trigger = {
            event_target:blackjack_player_1_tag = {
                AND = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = blackjack_player_1_status
                        value = 2
                    }
                    NOT = {
                        check_variable = {
                            which = blackjack_player_1_status
                            value = 3
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

    text = {
        localisation_key = debug_b_surrendered
        trigger = {
            event_target:blackjack_player_1_tag = {
                AND = {
                    check_variable = {
                        which = blackjack_player_1_status
                        value = 3
                    }
                    NOT = {
                        check_variable = {
                            which = blackjack_player_1_status
                            value = 4
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

    text = {
        localisation_key = debug_b_blackjack
        trigger = {
            event_target:blackjack_player_1_tag = {
                check_variable = {
                    which = blackjack_player_1_status
                    value = 4
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
